alert.note: Alert for Custer; Lincoln (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 11 at 11:49PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT EASTERN LINCOLN AND SOUTHWESTERN CUSTER COUNTIES THROUGH 1245 AM CDT... At 1148 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Lake Maloney State Recreation Area to 7 miles southwest of Gothenburg. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... North Platte, Brady, Maxwell, Lake Maloney, North Platte Airport, Keith, Cottonwood Canyon, Jeffrey Canyon and Vroman. This includes the following highways... Highway 97 between mile markers 1 and 5. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 171 and 208. Highway 83 between mile markers 69 and 102. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
